title: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it doesn't have any effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: The display property of an item set to 'none' does not hide the item when generating a PDF with the new emitter.
EB: The display property of an item set to 'none' should hide the item when generating a PDF with the new emitter.
SR: 1. Add a label. 2. Open the 'properties' view. 3. Set the sectionDisplay to 'none'. 4. Generate a PDF using the new emitter and observe that the label is still visible.
